评论概述: Shrinks in cold water and when dry cleaned
评论详情: Idk how something shrinks in cold water, but the new fabric this brand uses does. I am a die hard fan of R. Vivamos but was very disappointed in the quality of this dress, and the 3 others that I ordered. I have 5 dresses from this brand from 3 years ago and they are in great shape and no shrinkage. I wanted so badly to love this style, and I did initially, but once washed- again- in cold water and hang dry, they shrunk. And I did an experiment, I washed 2 in cold water and hung dry and had the other 2 dry cleaned- they all shrunk

I just love this dress. The material is lovely, pretty colors, and nice fabric. Fits well, flows nicely but yet it still has a bit of shape to it. If anything it’s possibly a tiny bit big. I’m 5’ and 128 lbs and purchased a small. (Usually wear 6-8). It is longer than I expected- from the photos I was expecting mid calf. The shorter length might have made it more practical for every day use, but as it is floor length I may not get as much use from it. No matter - I love it!

I love everything about this dress! The little buttons that fit into little loops, the tie in the front to adjust at the high waist area, and two layers of ruffles. I ordered this specific color to wear the turquoise jewelry I’ve made.it also goes with my new ivory boots. I might take this to an alterations lady that work’s miracles to maybe take off the top ruffle, shorten the dress a few inches, and reattach the ruffles, just so my boots would show a little more. Trust me, you will not be disappointed ordering any color of this dress! I ordered small. I’m 5’2” and my weight is around 118.

I really looked forward to this dress bc of reviews and I love lemon yellow. Disappointed as the dress appeared washed out, thinner and paler than the shorter top I had ordered in the same lemon yellow color/fabric. Also, the dress fitted tight on the waist because of the elastic. I wish it had the same adjustable draw tie which the purple dress in the same style had which I loved and kept and seemed thicker. Sad to return it. I would suggest these dresses should all come with the adjustable draw tie which can be pulled in to fit comfortably even though they may seem large. I also recommend the same style but in more updated prints. I think a reviewer mentioned the pink/white dress had the adjustable draw tie so I may order it. This should be mentioned in the description. If this dress were to be made with the adjustable draw tie and thicker fabric as the purple one, I would definitely order it. Thank you Amazon.

Was looking for lightweight, feminine, flowy dresses for summer and came across these. Have always loved Indian print fabrics so when I saw these I was excited, plus I love that you can pull the waist in, as this style of dress, on my curvy figure, is much more flattering when I can show my waist. The fabric feels like rayon which means it drapes better than if it was pure cotton and it should last longer than cotton if washed according to the instructions. I liked the dress so much that after trying it on, I promptly ordered another one in a different print. I normally wear a medium but after reading reviews about it shrinking I ordered it in the med and large to see which one would be best while allowing extra room for shrinkage. The med fit perfectly but the large fits fine too but with a bit extra fabric in case of shrinkage, so I went with the large.
One of my favorite purchases from Amazon so far. I think I am going to buy all the colors everything is best about these dresses. I have yellow green purple and now ordering black
I loved the dress but had to ship it back due to how small it ran. No way it was true to size. Unfortunate as they had no sizes large enough.

I’m bigger busted, and it was not too tight. It has a tie just below the bust - that allows you to adjust the fit. One of my favorite purchases.
